item.title: Today’s Strands #723 Hints and Answers for February 24, 2026
item.content:encoded:
Strands is a daily word search puzzle game from The New York Times. It is a relatively new game, launched in 2024, in which players seek a common theme among words in a 6×8 letter grid.

Whether it’s your first time playing or you’re a Strands veteran, today’s tips and strategies can help you find words faster. So, if you’ve found yourself stuck with today’s Strands, don’t worry, below you’ll find some helpful hints and even the answers for Strands Game #723 for Tuesday, February 24, 2026

To play today’s Strands, head to the game’s website.

IMPORTANT: The following information includes spoilers on today’s edition of Strands. If you don’t want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

How To Play Strands

Strands is a daily word search that challenges you to find words with a common theme. There’s also a Spanagram that reveals the deeper theme behind the words.

  • Words that are three letters and under do not count.
  • Words that reveal the correct theme appear in blue.
  • The Spanagram turns yellow when found.
  • Finding three words that don’t fit the theme will reveal a hint to help you find the proper words.

The goal is to string together as many words as possible. Every letter on the grid gets used! Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a popular online trend.

Strands can only be played on the New York Times website. You can also play on the NYT Games app.

Strands Hints For Today, February 24, 2026

The Strands’ answers for Game #724 are all related to research tools. As long as you think of classic resources to look up information, you should be good to go. It’s also one of the shorter puzzles with only five words. If you need extra hints, you don’t need to look up any other resource than this one!

General Strands Hints For February 24

Without giving today’s Strands answers completely away, here are a few helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: Wikipedia got its name from this classic resource.
  • Hint 2: This helps you find synonyms.
  • Hint 3: When you need to look up a word.

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Strands #723 for February 24, 2026.

Words to Help You Find Strand Hints for February 24, 2026

If you want help getting started without having today’s Strands answer given to you, there are a few starter words worth trying that will help you unlock some in-game hints. A few starter words that may help are:

  • HARD
  • COPE
  • LOOK
  • DIRECT

Today’s Strands Answer For Game #723 On February 24, 2026

If you’ve tried everything, including using the above hints, and are still stuck, you can find the answers to today’s Strands below. Check out the answers for yesterday’s puzzle here.

  • ENCYCLOPEDIA
  • THESAURUS
  • DIRECTORY
  • DICTIONARY
  • SPANAGRAM: LOOKITUP

If you solved today’s Strands without our answers, congratulations! If not, take note of the best tips above for tomorrow’s puzzle, and check back daily for more hints.

When Is The Next Strands Game After #723?

All New York Times games are updated daily at 12 am or Midnight in your respective time zone. Information about the next game is often available in the hours before, giving players a heads-up. The game on February 25 will be Strands Game #724.

What Is Strands?

Strands is a daily word search puzzle game created by The New York Times. Launched in 2024, Strands challenges players to discover a common theme among words in a 6×8 letter grid. The game’s original concept was developed by Juliette Seive, a research director on The New York Times Games team, with the aim of replicating Wordle’s success. Tracy Bennett serves as the puzzle editor for Strands, overseeing the creation and curation of daily puzzles since its launch.

For even more Insider Gaming delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls Online 2026 Seasons Direct Date Set
item.content:encoded:
Get ready to see what’s lined up for the next season of The Elder Scrolls Online. The team announced that the 2026 Season Direct presentation will be held on March 31 at 3:00 p.m. ET on Bethesda‘s Twitch channel.

The presentation will lay out the year ahead, providing a roadmap of content for 2026 in The Elder Scrolls Online.

History of The Elder Scrolls Online

The Elder Scrolls Online has been active for over 12 years, first launching on PC in April 2014. It launched on current-generation consoles in 2021. In 2025, the developers discussed enabling cross-play across multiple platforms, noting they were working on technical changes to make it possible. After full comments here.

The game has actually been in development since 2007, nearly 20 years ago. As fans of the franchise continue to await Elder Scrolls 6, TES Online provides a steady experience. Speaking of the sixth Elder Scrolls game, don’t expect it anytime soon. However, we do know the game will be powered by Creation Engine 3, as Todd Howard recently shared.

Even though The Elder Scrolls 6 is a long way away, at least one Elder Scrolls game is coming to the Nintendo Switch 2 very soon.

During a Nintendo Direct: Partner Showcase earlier in the month, Bethesda confirmed Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered for Nintendo Switch 2 as part of its growing third-party lineup. That game will be coming out in 2026. Learn more here.

Are you excited for this year’s TES Online season? What are you hoping for from the next mainline Elder Scrolls entry? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Ed Skrein Cast as Baldur in Prime Video’s God of War
item.content:encoded:
Another name has been cast in the God of War series coming to Prime Video.

Deadline reports that Ed Skrein has been cast as Baldur in the upcoming God of War series. Baldur is the youngest son of Odin, who will be played in the series by Mandy Patinkin.

Baldur is described as Odin’s most dangerous weapon. He’s also described as charismatic and razor-sharp with a tongue. He was cursed as a boy with the inability to feel pleasure and physical sensation; he replaced those feelings with anger and bloodlust.

More on the Cast of the Forthcoming God of War Series

In addition to this announcement, it has been confirmed that Ryan Hurst will play Kratos. He previously voiced Thor in the God of War: Ragnarök video game. Teresa Palmer will play Thor’s wife, Sif, in the series. Ólafur Darri Ólafsson, known for his work in Severance, will be portraying Thor. Learn more about the cast of the upcoming TV series at this link.

Prime Video’s God of War Is Renewed for a Second Season

Amazon renewed the series for a second season. Production is expected to begin in February 2026. Thus far, there’s no word on when the series will premiere. Insider Gaming will continue to monitor the story and report any and all updates as the series’ cast takes shape.

Are you excited for the upcoming show? What do you think about the casting choices so far? Sound off in our official Discord server. Also, don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
